arStrings.szText:
An additional {c_legendary}Legendary{/c} item will be offered when {icon:Marker_Bartering, 2.4}{c_important}Bartering{/c}, with a chance of it being a cache of Scattered Prisms, Gem Fragments and Runes.

{c_label}Bartering:{/c} This will go into effect on the next new stock delivery. The more difficult an item is to obtain, the less likely it will be offered.
